paramInformation.label: Beaming Enable/Disable
paramInformation.description: Used to enable/disable beaming. if set to 1, flir commands will be supported. but the device must be re-included into the network to activate it. 0 - disable 1 - enable

paramInformation.label: Power Status
paramInformation.description: This value is readonly. used to report the power status (usb or battery powered) 0 - when battery powered, the device will act as rss. 1 - when usb cable insert, the device will act as lss. the device must be re-included in the network to change the role type

options.label: When battery powered, the device will act as rss

paramInformation.label: Automatic Report Checklist 1
paramInformation.description: Checklist 1 for automatic timed report. when the corresponding item is selected, it will be checked when timeout setting by param111.  1 - battery 16 - uv 32 - temperature 64 - humidity 128 - lux

paramInformation.label: Automatic Report Checklist 2
paramInformation.description: Checklist 2 for automatic timed report. when the corresponding item is selected, it will be checked when timeout setting by param112. 1 - battery 16 -  32 - temperature 64 - humidity 128 - lux

paramInformation.label: Automatic Report Checklist 3
paramInformation.description: Battery. other value descriptions, please see above description box of this parameter

paramInformation.label: Motion Group Control(group2)
paramInformation.description: Set control of other devices on group2 based on motion trigger. 0 - send basic_set (0xff) when motion is triggered to associated device send basic_set (0x00) when motion is untriggered to associated device 1 - send basic_set (0x00) when motion is triggered send basic_set (0xff) when motion is untriggered 2 - send basic_set (0xff) when motion is triggered, nothing when motion untriggered. 3 - send basic_set (0x00) when motion is triggered, nothing when motion untriggered. 4 - send basic_set (0x00) when motion is untriggered, nothing when motion triggered. 5 - send basic_set (0xff) when motion is untriggered, nothing when motion triggered. 6 - send basic_set (value is configured by parameter 12) when motion is triggered to associated devices. send basic_set (value is configured by parameter 12) when motion is untriggered

options.label: Send basic_set (0xff) when motion is triggered to associated device send basic_set (0x00) when motion is untriggered to associated device

paramInformation.label: Motion Group Value Setting
paramInformation.description: Set Basic Set value for group2

paramInformation.label: Motion Sensitivity
paramInformation.description: Set the sensitivity of motion sensor. 0 - disable 1- minimum sensitivity 11 - maximum sensitivity

paramInformation.label: Threshold Check Enable/Disable
paramInformation.description: Enable/disable threshold reporting, check time can be adjusted by param45. 0 - disable all threshold reports 1 - enable all threshold reports

paramInformation.label: Temperature Threshold
paramInformation.description: Threshold = (value * 0.1) scale is determined by param64. 0 = disable

paramInformation.label: Threshold Check Time
paramInformation.description: Set threshold check time in seconds

paramInformation.label: Low Temperature Report
paramInformation.description: Eable/disable alarm report for low temperature(

paramInformation.label: Sensor Limit Control
paramInformation.description: This value is bit mask. used to enable/disable measurement reports for various sensors that is more than the upper limit value or less than the lower limit value. 1 - temperature upper level 2 - humidity upper level 4 - lux upper level 8 - uv upper level 16 - temperature lower level 32 - humidity lower level 64 - lux lower level 128 - uv lower level

paramInformation.label: Temperature Upper Limit
paramInformation.description: Set upper limit level for temperature

paramInformation.label: Motion Report Type
paramInformation.description: Set which command class will be sent when motion sensor is triggered or detriggered. 0 - sends notification report 1 - sends sensor binary report 2 - sends notification and sensor binary report

paramInformation.label: Temperature Lower Limit
paramInformation.description: Set lower limit level for temperature

paramInformation.label: Temperature Recover Limit
paramInformation.description: Temperature recover limit set in scale of 0.1

paramInformation.label: Vibration Sensor Enable/Disable
paramInformation.description: Used to enable/disable vibration sensor. 0 - disable vibration 1~254 - timeout set in minutes to reset vibration status 255 - timeout set in minutes to reset vibration status

options.label: Timeout set in minutes to reset vibration status

paramInformation.label: Out-of-limit State
paramInformation.description: This is read only and bit mask. out of the limit state of sensors. bit mask: 0 - within limit 1 - out of limit value: 1 - temperature upper level 2 - humidity upper level 4 - lux upper level 8 - uv upper level 16 - temperature lower level 32 - humidity lower level 64 - lux lower level 128 - uv lower level

paramInformation.label: Temperature Scale
paramInformation.description: Set the scale for temperature when reports. 0 - celsius 1 - fahrenheit

paramInformation.label: Vibration Intensity Reports
paramInformation.description: Used to enable/disable vibration intensity reports. if set to 1, vibration intensity will be sent to gateway when triggered. if set to 0, do not report

paramInformation.label: Led Activity
paramInformation.description: Allow user to enable/disable LED activity of specific reports sent by sensor. button press indicator is not affected by this. 0 - disable 1 - enable

paramInformation.label: Motion Sensor Report Indicator
paramInformation.description: If LED is enabled by param81, allow user to change the report color of motion sensor. 0 - disabled 1 - red 2 - blue 3 - green 4 - pink 5 - cyan 6 - purple 7 - orange 8 - yellow 9 - white

paramInformation.label: Temperature Sensor Report Indicator
paramInformation.description: Disable. other value descriptions, please see above description box of this parameter

paramInformation.label: Humidity Sensor Report Indicator
paramInformation.description: Disable. other value descriptions, please see above description box of this parameter

paramInformation.label: Lux Sensor Report Indicator
paramInformation.description: Disable. other value descriptions, please see above description box of this parameter

paramInformation.label: Uv Sensor Report Indicator
paramInformation.description: Disable. other value descriptions, please see above description box of this parameter

paramInformation.label: Vibration Sensor Report Indicator
paramInformation.description: Disable. other value descriptions, please see above description box of this parameter

paramInformation.label: Battery Report Indicator
paramInformation.description: Disable. other value descriptions, please see above description box of this parameter

paramInformation.label: Wakeup Report Indicator
paramInformation.description: Disable. other value descriptions, please see above description box of this parameter

paramInformation.label: Communication Indicator
paramInformation.description: Disable. other value descriptions, please see above description box of this parameter

metadata.inclusion:
1. Turn your primary controller into inclusion mode.
2. Press once the Action Button on the product.
metadata.exclusion:
1. Turn your primary controller into exclusion mode.
2. Press once the Action Button on the product.
metadata.reset: Press and hold the Action Button on product for 15-20s
